manifest.author: Nick de Bruin
manifest.name: Media Companion
manifest.description: Creates a searchable gallery and sidecar files for attachments such as images and videos. The sidecar files allow you to add notes and tags to your media files.

manifest.name: Time Things
manifest.description: Show clock in the corner. Track total editing time of a note and the last time it was modified.

manifest.name: Fastimer
manifest.description: Intermittent fasting tracker.

manifest.author: Ryota Ushio
manifest.name: LaTeX-like Theorem & Equation Referencer

manifest.author: Marc André Ueberall
manifest.name: Hârn Weather Generator
manifest.description: Unofficial Hârn weather generator. Generates the campaign weather for different time spans. The weather includes precipitation, temperature, wind direction and speed, moon phases and critical conditions for the whole of Western Venârivè.

manifest.author: HaierKeys
manifest.name: Custom Image Auto Uploader

Additionally, you can stretch, crop, and resize the images.
